name: LABWATCH
description:
LABWATCH is an atmospheric horror strategy game where you must make sure every machine is working while avoiding dangerous enemies.

Observe!

Look through cameras to find out which machines needs repairing and to find out the places you should avoid.

Tread Carefully!

To repair machines you yourself must venture out to fix them manually. Remember to restart your generator before going out and try to repair the machine before your generator breaks down!

Survive!

While venturing out to repair machines, you may encounter dangerous enemies. Try your best to survive all 3 nights without dying.
